treatment-md.title: Marcelonemobius Cadena-Castañeda, Rodríguez & Navarrete-Heredia, 2019, n. gen.
treatment-md.article-title: Orthoptera (Ensifera & Caelifera) collected using carrion traps in a Quercus forest in Jalisco, Mexico, with description of a new genus and a new species (Trigonidiidae: Nemobiinae)
